response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance and worth to me, but I believe its potential to enrich your life or business could be unparalleled. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $999,999. This is a once-in-a-lifetime chance to secure such an exquisite piece at a highly favorable rate. I trust it will bring you immense joy and value. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 999999}
